constrain.lab.PCR¶

Functions

PCR_program(amplicon, pgroup[, touch_down, ...])

Investigates ta and tm for amplicons and creates PCR program.

det_elon_time(amplicon)

This function determines elongation time for an amplicon and add the elongation time to the amplicon annotations

det_no_of_thermal_cyclers(amplicons, polymerase)

Determines the number of thermalcyclers that is needed based on elongation time differences

det_proc_speed(amplicon)

This function determines process speed dependent on the which polymerase is used

grouper(iterable, max_diff)

nanophotometer_concentrations(path)

This function reads a CSV file with nanophotometer concentraions and returns the concentrations in a list

pcr_locations(amplicons)

Save primer information for amplicons.

pcr_volumes([vol_p_reac, no_of_reactions, ...])

Can make a reaction scheme for PCR master mixes such as:

takeThird(elem)
